column5: My place is close to Downtown, Midtown, The Heights, White Oak Music Hall and St. Arnold's Brewery. It's 1 block off the METRORail (to NRG Stadium). It's close to major freeways and is centrally located between both Houston airports. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the location, comfortable beds, decor, the spacious patio with a downtown view. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
column8: Cozy Home a Block from the METRORail
